metadata.description: It all starts when Cheryl wants a new car, but instead of asking her father for a hand-out, she decides to raise the money herself. She has a yard sale, tries working at odd jobs, and even generates a media frenzy! Pick up these exciting three issues to see the wild and wacky antics as Cheryl Blossom tries to get a job!
metadata.name: Cheryl Blossom
